name: Tails-V1.0
description: A WhatsApp Bot Created By Sean Phiri

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. You can set `all | . | .!*`

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true to auto-react to messages.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true to auto-react to Status.

ANTIDELETE.description: Set true to see deleted messages.

WELCOME.description: Put 'false' or 'true' to enable or disable WELCOME.

CHATBOT.description: Set to true if you want your bot to autoreply messages.

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Set to true if you want the bot to read all messages.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",").

PUBLIC.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private. If it is private, then only the bot number can use it. If public, then everyone can use it.
